title: RAPIDS - Genetic Algorithm KNN - [CV 0.01840]
description: RAPIDS - Genetic Algorithm KNN - [CV 0.01840]The RAPIDS library is now available in all Kaggle notebooks. Hooray! Simply type import cuml or import cudf to load the two most popular packages. RAPIDS is described here. RAPIDS cuDF accelerates dataframe operations using GPU and has a similar api as Pandas. RAPIDS cuML accelerates machine learning algorithms using GPU and has a similar api as Scikit-Learn. Since RAPIDS ML algorithms are so fast, we can do things that were never possible like applying genetic algorithms to ML hyperparameter searchs! The ML algorithm kNN is very sensitive to the scaling of the feature columns. In this notebook, we find the weights for feature columns (0 <= w <= 1) using a genetic algorithm. This is similar to a feature selection algorithm like ridge regression which shrinks the importance of features. Alternatively we could mimic lasso regression if we choose only weights w = 0 and w = 1.
